meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hideous.
meanings.sent1: The hideousnesses of the monster scared the children.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the hideousnesses of the abandoned building in his painting.
meanings.sent3: Despite its hideousnesses, the quirky sculpture somehow charmed the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The hideousnesses of the crime scene left a lasting impression on the detective.
meanings.sent5: The hideousnesses of the old witch's face haunted the villagers' dreams.

meanings.definition: The collective qualities of being extremely unpleasant to look at.
meanings.sent1: The movie's special effects team created hideousnesses that shocked the audience.
meanings.sent2: The hideousnesses of the spoiled food made everyone gag.
meanings.sent3: The hideousnesses of the clown's outfit made the children burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The hideousnesses of the graffiti on the wall were a blight on the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The hideousnesses of the haunted house made it a popular Halloween attraction.
